divs: Sighting Detailsyellow in color and BRIGHT Today March 11, 2009 I was driving south on 135 south . Im looking in the sky and I And see a very BRIGHT Light , singlular at a 30 to 40 degree angle(im guessing merrick wantagh area) in front of me. As i point it out to my passenger it starts to delummanate(dim to gone) out of sight . Im thinking it was a plane from MacArthur Airport, but it dint have any other light pattern like a plane which noticed a few minutes after looking for what it was(plane like light patterns). I noticed no comtrail or any kid of jet trails. Very weird to me , do belive something is out there but when you really see something out of the norm, it really bugs you out
Summary: Looked like a single street light or headlight.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Merrick
There were no other sightings in Merrick on or around March 11th 2009
